pli-tv-pvr21:2.1: How do legal procedures fail in respect of object?

pli-tv-pvr21:2.11: If they do a legal procedure of ejection against one deserving a procedure of reconciliation, that procedure has failed in respect of object and is illegitimate.

pli-tv-pvr21:2.13: If they send back to the beginning one deserving probation, that procedure has failed in respect of object and is illegitimate.
pli-tv-pvr21:2.14: If they give the trial period to one deserving to be sent back to the beginning, that procedure has failed in respect of object and is illegitimate.
pli-tv-pvr21:2.15: If they rehabilitate one deserving the trial period, that procedure has failed in respect of object and is illegitimate.
pli-tv-pvr21:2.16: If they give full ordination to one deserving rehabilitation, that procedure has failed in respect of object and is illegitimate.
